title: TVS Motor Company posts 25% jump in sales at 3,01,898 units in December
description: Two-wheelers sales were at 2,90,064 units in December 2023 as compared to 2,27,666 units in the same month last year, up 27 per cent, TVS Motor Company said in a statement.
